original: īje sa cāśvamedhena devakṣatraśca tatsutaḥ // KūrmP_1,23.29 //
analyzed: īje sa ca aśvamedhena devakṣatraḥ ca tad sutaḥ
madhuḥ tasya tu dāyādaḥ tasmāt kuruvaśaḥ bhavat

original: putradvayamabhūt tasya sutrāmā cānureva ca // KūrmP_1,23.30 //
analyzed: putra dvayam abhūt tasya sutrāmā ca anuḥ eva ca
anoḥ tu purukutsaḥ bhūdaṃśuḥ tasya ca riktha bhāj
atha aṃśoḥ sattvataḥ nāma viṣṇu bhaktaḥ pratāpavān
mahātmā dāna nirataḥ dhanurveda vidām varaḥ
sa nāradasya vacanāt vāsudeva arcana anvitam
śāstram pravartayāmāsa kuṇḍa gola ādibhiḥ śrutam

original: tasya nāmnā tu vikhyātaṃ sāttvataṃ nāma śobhanam /
analyzed: tasya nāmnā tu vikhyātam sāttvatam nāma śobhanam
pravartate mahā śāstram kuṇḍa ādīnām hita āvaham
sāttvataḥ tasya putraḥ bhūt sarva śāstra viśāradaḥ
puṇyaślokaḥ mahā rājaḥ tena vai tat pravartitam
sāttvataḥ sattva saṃpannaḥ kauśalyām suṣuve sutān

original: andhakaṃ vai mahābhojaṃ vṛṣṇiṃ devāvṛdhaṃ nṛpam /
analyzed: andhakam vai mahābhojam vṛṣṇim devāvṛdham nṛpam

original: jyeṣṭhaṃ ca bhajamānākhyaṃ dhanurvedavidāṃ varam // KūrmP_1,23.35 //
analyzed: jyeṣṭham ca bhajamāna ākhyam dhanurveda vidām varam

original: teṣāṃ devāvṛdho rājā cacāra paramaṃ tapaḥ /
analyzed: teṣām devāvṛdhaḥ rājā cacāra paramam tapaḥ

original: putraḥ sarvaguṇopeto mama bhūyāditi prabhuḥ // KūrmP_1,23.36 //
analyzed: putraḥ sarva guṇa upetaḥ mama bhūyāt iti prabhuḥ
tasya babhruḥ iti khyātaḥ puṇya ślokaḥ bhavat nṛpaḥ
dhārmikaḥ rūpa saṃpannaḥ tattva jñāna rataḥ sadā
bhajamānasya sṛñjayyām bhajamānāḥ vijajñire

original: teṣāṃ pradhānau vikhyātau nimiḥ kṛkaṇa eva ca // KūrmP_1,23.38 //
analyzed: teṣām pradhānau vikhyātau nimiḥ kṛkaṇaḥ eva ca
mahābhoja kule jātāḥ bhojāḥ vaimārtikāḥ tathā
vṛṣṇeḥ sumitraḥ balavān anamitraḥ śinaḥ tathā
anamitrāt abhūt nighnaḥ nighnasya dvau babhūvatuḥ
prasenaḥ tu mahābhāgaḥ satrājit nāma ca uttamaḥ
anamitrāt śiniḥ jajñe kaniṣṭhāt vṛṣṇi nandanāt
satyavān satya saṃpannaḥ satyakaḥ tad sutaḥ bhavat
sātyakiḥ yuyudhānaḥ tu tasya asaṅgaḥ bhavat sutaḥ

original: kuṇistasya suto dhīmāṃstasya putro yugandharaḥ // KūrmP_1,23.42 //
analyzed: kuṇiḥ tasya sutaḥ dhīmān tasya putraḥ yugandharaḥ

original: mādrayā vṛṣṇeḥ suto jajñe pṛśnirvai yadunandanaḥ /
analyzed: mādrayā vṛṣṇeḥ sutaḥ jajñe pṛśniḥ vai yadu nandanaḥ

original: jajñāte tanayau pṛśneḥ śvaphalkaścitrakaśca ha // KūrmP_1,23.43 //
analyzed: jajñāte tanayau pṛśneḥ śvaphalkaḥ citrakaḥ ca ha
śvaphalkaḥ kāśi rājasya sutām bhāryām avindata
tasyām ajanayat putram akrūram nāma dhārmikam

original: upamaṅgustathā maṅguranye ca bahavaḥ sutāḥ // KūrmP_1,23.44 //
analyzed: upamaṅguḥ tathā maṅguḥ anye ca bahavaḥ sutāḥ
akrūrasya smṛtaḥ putraḥ devavān iti viśrutaḥ
upadevaḥ ca puṇya ātmā tayoḥ viśva pramāthinau
citrakasya abhavat putraḥ pṛthuḥ vipṛthuḥ eva ca
aśvagrīvaḥ subāhuḥ ca supārśvaka gaveṣaṇau

original: andhakāt kāśyaduhitā lebhe ca caturaḥ sutān /
analyzed: andhakāt kāśya duhitā lebhe ca caturaḥ sutān

original: kukuraṃ bhajamānaṃ ca śuciṃ kambalabarhiṣam // KūrmP_1,23.47 //
analyzed: kukuram bhajamānam ca śucim kambalabarhiṣam
kukurasya sutaḥ vṛṣṇiḥ vṛṣṇeḥ tu tanayaḥ
kapotaromā vipulaḥ tasya putraḥ vilomakaḥ

original: tasyāsīt tumburusakhā vidvān putro nalaḥ kila /
analyzed: tasya āsīt tumburusakhāḥ vidvān putraḥ nalaḥ kila
khyāyate tasya nāma anuḥ anoḥ ānakadundubhiḥ
sa govardhanam āsādya tatāpa vipulam tapaḥ

original: varaṃ tasmai dadau devo brahmā lokamaheśvaraḥ // KūrmP_1,23.50 //
analyzed: varam tasmai dadau devaḥ brahmā loka mahā īśvaraḥ
vaṃśasya ca akṣayām kīrti gāna yogam anuttamam
guroḥ abhyadhikam viprāḥ kāmarūpi tvam eva ca
sa labdhvā varam avyagraḥ vareṇyam vṛṣavāhanam
pūjayāmāsa gānena sthāṇum tridaśa pūjitam
tasya gāna ratasya atha bhagavān ambikāpatiḥ

original: kanyāratnaṃ dadau devo durlabhaṃ tridaśairapi // KūrmP_1,23.53 //
analyzed: kanyā ratnam dadau devaḥ durlabham tridaśaiḥ api
tayā sa saṅgataḥ rājā gāna yogam anuttamam
aśikṣayat amitra ghnaḥ priyām tām bhrānta locanām
tasyām utpādayāmāsa su bhujam nāma śobhanam
rūpa lāvaṇya saṃpannām hrīmatīm api kanyakām

original: tatastaṃ jananī putraṃ bālye vayasi śobhanam /
analyzed: tatas tam jananī putram bālye vayasi śobhanam

original: śikṣayāmāsa vidhivad gānavidyāṃ ca kanyakām // KūrmP_1,23.56 //
analyzed: śikṣayāmāsa vidhivat gāna vidyām ca kanyakām
kṛta upanayanaḥ vedān adhītya vidhivat guroḥ

original: udvavāhātmajāṃ kanyāṃ gandharvāṇāṃ tu mānasīm // KūrmP_1,23.57 //
analyzed: udvavāha ātmajām kanyām gandharvāṇām tu mānasīm
tasyām utpādayāmāsa pañca putrān anuttamān
vīṇā vādana tattva jñān gāna śāstra viśāradān
putraiḥ pautraiḥ sa patnīkaḥ rājā gāna viśāradaḥ
pūjayāmāsa gānena devam tripura nāśanam
hrīmatī ca api yā kanyā śrīḥ iva āyata locanā
subāhuḥ nāma gandharvaḥ tām ādāya yayau purīm
tasyām api abhavan putrāḥ gandharvasya su tejasaḥ
suṣeṇa vīra sugrīva subhoja naravāhanāḥ
athā āsīt abhijit putraḥ vīraḥ tu ānakadundubheḥ
punarvasuḥ ca abhijitaḥ saṃbabhūva āhukaḥ sutaḥ
āhukasya ugrasenaḥ ca devakaḥ ca dvijottamāḥ

original: devakasya sutā vīrā jajñire tridaśopamāḥ // KūrmP_1,23.63 //
analyzed: devakasya sutāḥ vīrāḥ jajñire tridaśa upamāḥ
devavān upadevaḥ ca sudevaḥ devarakṣitaḥ

original: teṣāṃ svasāraḥ saptāsan vasudevāya tā dadau // KūrmP_1,23.64 //
analyzed: teṣām svasāraḥ sapta āsan vasudevāya tāḥ dadau
vṛkadevā upadevā ca tathā anyā devarakṣitā

original: śrīdevā śāntidevā ca sahadevā sahadevā ca suvratā /
analyzed: śrīdevā śāntidevā ca sahadevā sahadevā ca suvratā

original: devakī cāpi tāsāṃ tu variṣṭhābhūt sumadhyamā // KūrmP_1,23.65 //
analyzed: devakī ca api tāsām tu variṣṭhā abhūt sumadhyamā
agrasenasya putraḥ bhūt nyagrodhaḥ kaṃsaḥ eva ca
subhūmiḥ rāṣṭrapālaḥ ca tuṣṭimān śaṅkuḥ eva ca
bhajamānāt abūt putraḥ prakhyātaḥ sau vidūrathaḥ
tasya śūraḥ śamiḥ tasmāt pratikṣatraḥ tatas bhavat
svayaṃbhojaḥ tatas tasmāt hṛdikaḥ śatru tāpanaḥ
kṛtavarmā atha tad putraḥ devaraḥ tad sutaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: sa śūrastatsuto dhīmān vasudevo 'tha tatsutaḥ // KūrmP_1,23.68 //
analyzed: sa śūraḥ tad sutaḥ dhīmān vasudevaḥ tha tad sutaḥ
vasudevā vat mahā bāhuḥ vāsudevaḥ jagadguruḥ
babhūva devakīputraḥ devaiḥ abhyarthitaḥ hariḥ
rohiṇī ca mahābhāgā vasudevasya śobhanā

original: asūta patnī saṃkarṣaṃ rāmaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ halāyudham // KūrmP_1,23.70 //
analyzed: asūta patnī saṃkarṣam rāmam jyeṣṭham halāyudham
saḥ eva paramātmā asau vāsudevaḥ jagat mayaḥ

original: halāyudhaḥ svayaṃ sākṣāccheṣaḥ saṃkarṣaṇaḥ prabhuḥ // KūrmP_1,23.71 //
analyzed: halāyudhaḥ svayam sākṣāt śeṣaḥ saṃkarṣaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
bhṛgu śāpa chalena eva mānayan mānuṣīm tanum

original: babhūta tasyāṃ devakyāṃ rohiṇyāmapi mādhavaḥ // KūrmP_1,23.72 //
analyzed: babhūta tasyām devakyām rohiṇyām api mādhavaḥ
umā deha samudbhūtā yoga nidrā ca kauśīkī
niyogāt vāsudevasya yaśodā tanayā hi abhūt
ye ca anye vasudevasya vāsudeva agrajāḥ sutāḥ

original: prāgeva kaṃsastān sarvān jaghāna munipuṅgavāḥ // KūrmP_1,23.74 //
analyzed: prāk eva kaṃsaḥ tān sarvān jaghāna muni puṅgavāḥ
suṣeṇaḥ ca tathā udāyī bhadrasenaḥ mahā balaḥ
ṛjudāsaḥ bhadradāsaḥ kīrtimān api pūrvajaḥ
hateṣu eteṣu sarveṣu rohiṇī vasudevataḥ

original: asūta rāmaṃ lokeśaṃ balabhadraṃ halāyudham // KūrmP_1,23.76 //
analyzed: asūta rāmam loka īśam balabhadram halāyudham
jāte tha rāme devānām ādim ātmānam acyutam
asūta devakī kṛṣṇam śrīvatsa aṅkita vakṣasam
revatī nāma rāmasya bhāryā āsīt su guṇa anvitā
tasyām utpādayāmāsa putrau dvau niśaṭha ulmukau
ṣoḍaśa strī sahastrāṇi kṛṣṇasya akliṣṭa karmaṇaḥ
babhūvuḥ ātmajāḥ tāsu sahastraśas
cārudeṣṇaḥ sucāruḥ ca cāruveṣaḥ yaśodharaḥ

original: cāruśravāścāruyaśāḥ pradyumnaḥ śaṅkha eva ca // KūrmP_1,23.80 //
analyzed: cāruśravāḥ cāruyaśāḥ pradyumnaḥ śaṅkhaḥ eva ca
mahā bala parākramāḥ
viśiṣṭāḥ sarva putrāṇām saṃbabhūvuḥ im sutāḥ
tān dṛṣṭvā tanayān vīrān raukmiṇeyān janārdanam

original: jāmbavatyabravīt kṛṣṇaṃ bhāryā tasya śucismitā // KūrmP_1,23.82 //
analyzed: jāmbavatī abravīt kṛṣṇam bhāryā tasya śuci smitā
mama tvam puṇḍarīkākṣa viśiṣṭam guṇavattamam
sureśa sadṛśam putram dehi dānava sūdana

original: jātbavatyā vacaḥ śrutvā jagannāthaḥ svayaṃ hariḥ /
analyzed: jātbavatyāḥ vacaḥ śrutvā jagannāthaḥ svayam hariḥ
samārebhe tapaḥ kartum taponidhiḥ arindamaḥ
tat śṛṇudhvam muni śreṣṭhāḥ yathā asau devakī sutaḥ

original: dṛṣṭvā lebhe sutaṃ rudraṃ taptvā tīvraṃ mahat tapaḥ // KūrmP_1,23.85 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā lebhe sutam rudram taptvā tīvram mahat tapaḥ

original: iti śrīkūrmapurāṇe ṣaṭsāhastryāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ pūrvavibhāge trayoviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī kūrmapurāṇe ṣaṭsāhastryām saṃhitāyām pūrva vibhāge trayoviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
sūtaḥ uvāca
atha devaḥ hṛṣīkeśaḥ bhagavān puruṣottamaḥ

original: tatāpa ghoraṃ putrārthaṃ nidānaṃ tapasastapaḥ // KūrmP_1,24.1 //
analyzed: tatāpa ghoram putra artham nidānam tapasaḥ tapaḥ
sva icchayā api avatīrṇaḥ sau kṛtakṛtyaḥ viśvadhṛk

original: cacāra svātmano mūlaṃ bodhayan bhāvamaiśvaram // KūrmP_1,24.2 //
analyzed: cacāra sva ātmanaḥ mūlam bodhayan bhāvam aiśvaram
jagāma yogibhiḥ juṣṭam nānā pakṣi samākulam
āśramam tu upamanyoḥ vai muni indrasya mahātmanaḥ
tapat tri rājam ārūḍhaḥ suparṇam ati tejasam
nānā druma latā ākīrṇam nānā puṣpa upaśobhitam
ṛṣīṇām āśramaiḥ juṣṭam veda ghoṣa nināditam
siṃha ṛkṣa śarabha ākīrṇam śārdūla gaja saṃyutam
vimala svādu pānīyaiḥ sarobhiḥ upaśobhitam
ārāmaiḥ vividhaiḥ juṣṭam devatāyatanaiḥ śubhaiḥ
ṛṣikaiḥ ṛṣi putraiḥ ca mahā muni gaṇaiḥ tathā
veda adhyayana saṃpannaiḥ sevitam ca agnihotribhiḥ
yogibhiḥ dhyāna nirataiḥ nāsā agra gata locanaiḥ
upetam sarvatas puṇyam jñānibhiḥ tattva darśibhiḥ
nadībhiḥ abhitas juṣṭam jāpakaiḥ brahma vādibhiḥ
sevitam tāpasaiḥ puṇyaiḥ īśa ārādhana tatparaiḥ
praśāntaiḥ satya saṃkalpaiḥ niḥ śokaiḥ nirupadravaiḥ
bhasma avadāta sarva aṅgaiḥ rudra jāpya parāyaṇaiḥ
muṇḍitaiḥ jaṭilaiḥ śuddhaiḥ tathā anyaiḥ ca śikhā jaṭaiḥ
sevitam tāpasaiḥ nitya jñānibhiḥ brahmacāribhiḥ
tatra āśrama vare ramye siddha āśrama vibhūṣite
gaṅgā bhagavatī nityam vahati eva agha nāśinī
sa tān anviṣya viśvātmā tāpasān vīta kalmaṣān
praṇāmena atha vacasā pūjayāmāsa mādhavaḥ
te te dṛṣṭvā jagadyonim śaṅkha cakra gadā dharam
praṇemuḥ bhakti saṃyuktāḥ yoginām paramam gurum
stuvanti vaidikaiḥ mantraiḥ kṛtvā hṛdi sanātanam
procuḥ anyonyam avyaktam ādidevam mahā munim
ayam sa bhagavān ekaḥ sākṣāt nārāyaṇaḥ paraḥ
agacchati adhunā devaḥ purāṇapuruṣaḥ svayam
ayam eva avyayaḥ straṣṭā saṃhartā ca eva rakṣakaḥ

original: amūrto mūrtimān bhūtvā munīn draṣṭumihāgataḥ // KūrmP_1,24.17 //
analyzed: amūrtaḥ mūrtimān bhūtvā munīn draṣṭum iha āgataḥ

original: eṣa dhātā vidhātā ca samāgacchati sarvagaḥ /
analyzed: eṣa dhātā vidhātā ca samāgacchati sarva gaḥ
anādiḥ akṣayaḥ nantaḥ mahābhūtaḥ maheśvaraḥ
śrutvā śrutvā hariḥ teṣām vacāṃsi vacana atigaḥ

original: yayau sa tūrṇaṃ govindaḥ sthānaṃ tasya mahātmanaḥ // KūrmP_1,24.19 //
analyzed: yayau sa tūrṇam govindaḥ sthānam tasya mahātmanaḥ

original: upaspṛśyātha bhāvena tīrthe tīrthe sa yādavaḥ /
analyzed: upaspṛśya atha bhāvena tīrthe tīrthe sa yādavaḥ
cakāra devakī sūnuḥ deva ṛṣi pitṛ tarpaṇam
nadīnām tīra saṃsthāni sthāpitāni muni īśvaraiḥ
liṅgāni pūjayāmāsa śaṃbhoḥ amita tejasaḥ

original: dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭvā samāyāntaṃ yatra yatra janārdanam /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭvā samāyāntam yatra yatra janārdanam
pūjayāñcakrire puṣpaiḥ akṣataiḥ tatra vāsinaḥ
samīkṣya vāsudevam tam śārṅga śaṅkha asi dhāriṇam

original: tasthire niścalāḥ sarve śubhāṅgaṃ tannivāsinaḥ // KūrmP_1,24.23 //
analyzed: tasthire niścalāḥ sarve śubha aṅgam tad nivāsinaḥ
yāni tatra ārurukṣūṇām mānasāni janārdanam
dṛṣṭvā samīhitāni āsan niṣkrāmanti purā ahiram
atha avagāhya gaṅgāyām kṛtvā deva ādi tarpaṇam
ādāya puṣpa varyāṇi muni indrasya āviśat gṛham
dṛṣṭvā tam yoginām śreṣṭham bhasma uddhūlita vigraham

original: jaṭācīradharaṃ śāntaṃ nanāma śirasā munim // KūrmP_1,24.26 //
analyzed: jaṭā cīra dharam śāntam nanāma śirasā munim
ālokya kṛṣṇam āyāntam pūjayāmāsa tattva vid
āsane ca āsayāmāsa yoginām prathama atithim

original: uvāca vacasāṃ yoniṃ jānīmaḥ paramaṃ padam /
analyzed: uvāca vacasām yonim jānīmaḥ paramam padam
viṣṇum avyakta saṃsthānam śiṣya bhāvena saṃsthitam

original: svāgataṃ te hṛṣīkeśa saphalāni tapāṃsi naḥ /
analyzed: svāgatam te hṛṣīkeśa sa phalāni tapāṃsi naḥ

original: yad sākṣādeva viśvātmā madgehaṃ viṣṇurāgataḥ // KūrmP_1,24.29 //
analyzed: yat sākṣāt eva viśvātmā mad geham viṣṇuḥ āgataḥ

original: tvāṃ na paśyanti munayo yatanto 'pi hi yoginaḥ /
analyzed: tvām na paśyanti munayaḥ yatantaḥ hi yoginaḥ
tādṛśasya atha bhavataḥ kim āgamana kāraṇam
śrutvā upamanyoḥ tat vākyam bhagavān keśimardanaḥ

original: vyājahāra mahāyogī vacanaṃ praṇipatya tam // KūrmP_1,24.31 //
analyzed: vyājahāra mahā yogī vacanam praṇipatya tam
śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca
bhagavan draṣṭum icchāmi girīśam kṛttivāsasam
saṃprāptaḥ bhavataḥ sthānam bhagavat darśana utsukaḥ

original: kathaṃ sa bhagavānīśo dṛśyo yogavidāṃ varaḥ /
analyzed: katham sa bhagavān īśaḥ dṛśyaḥ yoga vidām varaḥ
mayā acireṇa kutra aham drakṣyāmi tam umāpatim
iti āha bhagavān uktaḥ dṛśyate parameśvaraḥ

original: bhaktyā cogreṇa tapasā tatkuruṣveha yatnataḥ // KūrmP_1,24.34 //
analyzed: bhaktyā ca ugreṇa tapasā tat kuruṣva iha yatnataḥ
iha īśvaram devadevam muni indrāḥ brahma vādinaḥ
dhyāyantaḥ trāsate devam jāpinaḥ tāpasāḥ ca ye
iha devaḥ sa patnīkaḥ bhagavān vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ
krīḍate vividhaiḥ bhūtaiḥ yogibhiḥ parivāritaḥ
iha āśrame purā rudrāt tapaḥ taptvā su dāruṇam

original: lebhe maheśvarād yogaṃ vasiṣṭho bhagavānṛṣiḥ // KūrmP_1,24.37 //
analyzed: lebhe maheśvarāt yogam vasiṣṭhaḥ bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
iha eva bhagavān vyasaḥ kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaḥ prabhuḥ

original: dṛṣṭvā taṃ paramaṃ jñānaṃ labdhavānīśvareśvaram // KūrmP_1,24.38 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tam paramam jñānam labdhavān īśvara īśvaram
iha āśrama vare ramye tapaḥ taptvā kapardinaḥ
avindat putrakān rudrāt surabhiḥ bhakti saṃyutā

ucca āsana sthāḥ śūdrāḥ tu dvija madhye parantapa

original: jñātvā na hiṃsate rājā kalau kālabalena tu // KūrmP_1,28.18 //
analyzed: jñātvā na hiṃsate rājā kalau kāla balena tu
puṣpaiḥ ca hasitaiḥ ca eva tathā anyaiḥ maṅgalaiḥ dvijāḥ
śūdrān abhyarcayanti alpa śruta bhagya bala anvitāḥ
na prekṣante rcitān ca api śūdrāḥ dvijavarān nṛpa

original: sevāvasaramālokya dvāri tiṣṭhanti ca dvijāḥ // KūrmP_1,28.20 //
analyzed: sevā avasaram ālokya dvāri tiṣṭhanti ca dvijāḥ
vāhana sthān samāvṛtya śūdrām śūdra upajīvinaḥ

original: sevante brāhmaṇāstatra stuvanti stutibhiḥ kalau // KūrmP_1,28.21 //
analyzed: sevante brāhmaṇāḥ tatra stuvanti stutibhiḥ kalau
adhyāpayanti vai vedām śūdrām śūdra upajīvinaḥ

original: paṭhanti vaidikān mantrān nāstikyaṃ ghoramāśritāḥ // KūrmP_1,28.22 //
analyzed: paṭhanti vaidikān mantrān nāstikyam ghoram āśritāḥ
tapaḥ yajña phalānām ca vikretāraḥ dvijottamāḥ
yatayaḥ ca bhaviṣyanti sahastraśas
nāśayanti hi adhītāni na adhigacchanti ca anagha
gāyanti laukikaiḥ gānaiḥ daivatāni narādhipa
vāma pāśupata ācārāḥ tathā vai pāñcarātrikāḥ

original: bhaviṣyanti kalau tasmin brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyāstathā // KūrmP_1,28.25 //
analyzed: bhaviṣyanti kalau tasmin brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyāḥ tathā
jñāna karmaṇi uparate loke niṣkriya tām gate
kīṭa mūṣaka sarpāḥ ca dharṣayiṣyanti mānavān
kurvānti ca avatārāṇi brāhmaṇānām kuleṣu vai
dadhīca śāpa nirdagdhāḥ purā dakṣa adhvare dvijāḥ
nindanti ca mahādevam tamasā āviṣṭa cetasaḥ

original: vṛthā dharmaṃ cariṣyanti kalau tasmin yugāntike // KūrmP_1,28.28 //
analyzed: vṛthā dharmam cariṣyanti kalau tasmin yuga antike
ye ca anye śāpa nirdagdhāḥ gautamasya mahātmanaḥ

original: sarve te ca bhaviṣyanti brāhmaṇādyāḥ svajātiṣu // KūrmP_1,28.29 //
analyzed: sarve te ca bhaviṣyanti brāhmaṇa ādyāḥ sva jātiṣu
vinindanti hṛṣīkeśam brāhmaṇān brahma vādinaḥ
veda bāhya vrata ācārāḥ durācārāḥ vṛthak śramāḥ

original: mohayanti janān sarvān darśayitvā phalāni ca /
analyzed: mohayanti janān sarvān darśayitvā phalāni ca
tamasā āviṣṭa manasaḥ vaiḍāla vṛttikā adhamāḥ
kalau rudraḥ mahādevaḥ lokānām īśvaraḥ paraḥ

original: na devatā bhavennṛṇāṃ devatānāṃ ca daivatam // KūrmP_1,28.32 //
analyzed: na devatā bhavet nṛṇām devatānām ca daivatam
kariṣyati avatārāṇi śaṅkaraḥ nīlalohitaḥ
śrauta smārta pratiṣṭhā artham bhaktānām hita kāmyayā
upadekṣyati tad jñānam śiṣyāṇām brahma saṃjñitam
sarva vedānta sāram hi dharmān veda nidarśitān

original: ye taṃ viprā niṣevante yena kenopacārataḥ /
analyzed: ye tam viprāḥ niṣevante yena kena upacārataḥ

original: vijityakalijān doṣān yānti te paramaṃ padam // KūrmP_1,28.35 //
analyzed: vijitya kali jān doṣān yānti te paramam padam
anāyāsena su mahat puṇyam āpnoti mānavaḥ
aneka doṣa duṣṭasya kaleḥ eṣa mahān guṇaḥ
tasmāt sarva prayatnena prāpya māheśvaram yugam

original: viśeṣād brāhmaṇo rudramīśānaṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajet // KūrmP_1,28.37 //
analyzed: viśeṣāt brāhmaṇaḥ rudram īśānam śaraṇam vrajet
ye namanti virūpākṣam īśānam kṛttivāsasam

original: prasannacetaso rudraṃ te yānti paramaṃ padam // KūrmP_1,28.38 //
analyzed: prasanna cetasaḥ rudram te yānti paramam padam
yathā rudra namaskāraḥ sarva karma phalaḥ dhruvam
anya deva namaskārāt na tat phalam avāpnuyāt
evaṃvidhe kali yuge doṣāṇām eka śodhanam
mahādeva namaskāraḥ dhyānam dānam iti śrutiḥ
tasmāt anīśvarān anyān tyaktvā devam maheśvaram

original: samāśrayed virūpākṣaṃ yadīcchet paramaṃ padam // KūrmP_1,28.41 //
analyzed: samāśrayet virūpākṣam yadi icchet paramam padam
na arcayanti iha ye rudram śivam tridaśa vanditam

original: teṣāṃ dānaṃ tapo yajño vṛthā jīvitameva ca // KūrmP_1,28.42 //
analyzed: teṣām dānam tapaḥ yajñaḥ vṛthā jīvitam eva ca
namaḥ rudrāya mahate devadevāya śūline

original: tryambakāya trinetrāya yogināṃ gurave namaḥ // KūrmP_1,28.43 //
analyzed: tryambakāya trinetrāya yoginām gurave namaḥ
namaḥ stu vāmadevāya mahādevāya vedhase
śaṃbhave sthāṇave nityam śivāya parameṣṭhine

original: namaḥ śomāya rudrāya mahāgrāsāya hetave // KūrmP_1,28.44 //
analyzed: namaḥ śomāya rudrāya mahāgrāsāya hetave
prapadye ham virūpākṣam śaraṇyam brahmacāriṇam
mahādevam mahā yogam īśānam ca ambikāpatim
yoginām yoga dātāram yoga māyā samāvṛtam
yoginām kurum ācāryam yogi gamyam pinākinam
saṃsāra tāraṇam rudram brahmāṇam brahmaṇaḥ dhipam
śāśvatam sarvagam brahmaṇyam brāhmaṇapriyam
kapardinam kāla mūrtim amūrti parameśvaram
eka mūrti mahā mūrti veda vedyam divaspatim
nīlakaṇṭham viśvamūrti vyāpinam viśvaretasam
kālāgnim kāla dahanam kāma dam kāma nāśanam
namasye giriśam devam candra avayava bhūṣaṇam
vilohitam lelihāna māhityam parameṣṭhinam

original: ugraṃ paśupatiṃ bhīmaṃ bhāskaraṃ tamasaḥ param // KūrmP_1,28.50 //
analyzed: ugram paśupatim bhīmam bhāskaram tamasaḥ param
iti etat lakṣaṇam proktam yugānām vai samāsatas
atīta anāgatānām vai yāvat manvantara kṣayaḥ
manvantareṇa ca ekena sarvāṇi eva antarāṇi vai

original: vyākhyātāni na saṃdehaḥ kalpaḥ kalpena caiva hi // KūrmP_1,28.52 //
analyzed: vyākhyātāni na saṃdehaḥ kalpaḥ kalpena ca eva hi
manvantareṣu sarveṣu atīta anāgateṣu vai
tulya abhimāninaḥ sarve nāma rūpaiḥ bhavanti uta
evam uktaḥ bhagavatā kirīṭī śvetavāhanaḥ
babhāra paramām bhaktim īśāne vyabhicāriṇīm
namaścakāra tam ṛṣim kṛṣṇadvaipāyanam prabhum

original: sarvajñaṃ sarvakartāraṃ skṣād viṣṇuṃ vyavasthitam // KūrmP_1,28.55 //
analyzed: sarvajñam sarva kartāram viṣṇum vyavasthitam
tam uvāca punar vyāsaḥ pātham parapurañjayam

original: karābhyāṃ suśubhābhyāṃ ca saṃspṛśya praṇataṃ muniḥ // KūrmP_1,28.56 //
analyzed: karābhyām su śubhābhyām ca saṃspṛśya praṇatam muniḥ
dhanyaḥ si anugṛhītaḥ si tvādṛśaḥ nyaḥ na vidyate

original: trailokye śaṅkare nūnaṃ bhaktaḥ parapurañjaya // KūrmP_1,28.57 //
analyzed: trailokye śaṅkare nūnam bhaktaḥ parapurañjaya
dṛṣṭavān asi tam devam viśvākṣam viśvatomukham
pratyakṣam eva sarva īśam rudram sarva jagat gurum

original: jñānaṃ tadaiśvaraṃ divyaṃ yathāvad viditaṃ tvayā /
analyzed: jñānam tat aiśvaram divyam yathāvat viditam tvayā
svayam eva hṛṣīkeśaḥ prītyā uvāca sanātanaḥ

original: gaccha gaccha svakaṃ sthānaṃ na śokaṃ kartumarhasi /
analyzed: gaccha gaccha svakam sthānam na śokam kartum arhasi

original: vrajasva parayā bhaktyā śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ śivam // KūrmP_1,28.60 //
analyzed: vrajasva parayā bhaktyā śaraṇyam śaraṇam śivam
evam uktvā sa bhagavān anugṛhya arjunam prabhuḥ
jagāma śaṅkara purīm samārādhayitum bhavam

original: pāṇḍaveyo 'pi tad vākyāt saṃprāpya śaraṇaṃ śivam /
analyzed: pāṇḍaveyaḥ u pi tat vākyāt saṃprāpya śaraṇam śivam
saṃtyajya sarva karmāṇi tad bhakti paramaḥ bhavat
na arjunena samaḥ śaṃbhoḥ bhaktyā bhūtaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: muktvā satyavatīsūnuṃ kṛṣṇaṃ vā devakīsutam // KūrmP_1,28.63 //
analyzed: muktvā satyavatī sūnum kṛṣṇam vā devakī sutam

original: tasmai bhagavate nityaṃ namaḥ satyāya dhīmate /
analyzed: tasmai bhagavate nityam namaḥ satyāya dhīmate
pārāśaryāya munaye vyāsāya amita tejase
kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaḥ sākṣāt viṣṇuḥ eva sanātanaḥ

original: ko hyanyastattvato rudraṃ vetti taṃ parameśvaram // KūrmP_1,28.65 //
analyzed: kaḥ hi anyaḥ tattvataḥ rudram vetti tam parameśvaram
namaḥ kurudhvam tam ṛṣim kṛṣṇam satyavatī sutam
pārāśaryam mahātmānam yoginam viṣṇum avyayam
evam uktāḥ tu munayaḥ sarve eva samīhitāḥ
preṇemuḥ tam mahātmānam vyāsam satyavatī sutam

original: iti śrīkūrmapurāṇe ṣaṭsāhastryāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ pūrvavibhāge aṣṭāviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī kūrmapurāṇe ṣaṭsāhastryām saṃhitāyām pūrva vibhāge aṣṭāviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ
prāpya vārāṇasīm divyām kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaḥ muniḥ

original: kimakārṣonmahābuddhiḥ śrotuṃ kautūhalaṃ hi naḥ // KūrmP_1,29.1 //
analyzed: kim akārṣot mahābuddhiḥ śrotum kautūhalam hi naḥ
sūtaḥ uvāca
prāpya vārāṇasī divyām upaspṛśya mahā muniḥ

original: pūjayāmāsa jāhnavyāṃ devaṃ viśveśvaraṃ śivam // KūrmP_1,29.2 //
analyzed: pūjayāmāsa jāhnavyām devam viśveśvaram śivam

original: tamāgataṃ puniṃ dṛṣṭvā tatra ye nivasanti vai /
analyzed: tam āgatam punim dṛṣṭvā tatra ye nivasanti vai
pūjayāñcakrire vyāsam munayaḥ muni puṅgavam
papracchuḥ praṇatāḥ sarve kathāḥ pāpa vināśanīḥ
mahādeva āśrayāḥ puṇyāḥ mokṣa dharmān sanātanān
sa ca api kathayāmāsa sarva jñaḥ bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
māhātmyam devadevasya dharmān veda nidarśitān
teṣām madhye muni indrāṇām vyāsa śiṣyaḥ mahā muniḥ
pṛṣṭavān jaiminiḥ vyāsam gūḍham artham sanātanam
jaiminiḥ uvāca
bhagavan saṃśayam tu ekam chettum arhasi tattvataḥ

original: na vidyate hyaviditaṃ bhavatā paramarṣiṇā // KūrmP_1,29.7 //
analyzed: na vidyate hi aviditam bhavatā parama ṛṣiṇā
kecid dhyānam praśaṃsanti dharmam eva apare janāḥ

original: anye sāṃkhyaṃ tathā yogaṃ tapastvanye maharṣayaḥ // KūrmP_1,29.8 //
analyzed: anye sāṃkhyam tathā yogam tapaḥ tu anye mahā ṛṣayaḥ
brahmacaryam atho maunam anye prāhar mahā ṛṣayaḥ
ahiṃsām satyam api anye saṃnyāsam apare viduḥ
kecid dayām praśaṃsanti dānam adhyayanam tathā
tīrtha yātrām tathā kecid anye ca indriya nigraham
kim eteṣām bhavet jyāyaḥ prabrūhi muni puṅgava

original: yadi vā vidyate 'pyanyad guhyaṃ tadvaktumarhasi // KūrmP_1,29.11 //
analyzed: yadi vā vidyate guhyam tat vaktum arhasi
śrutvā sa jaimineḥ vākyam kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaḥ muniḥ

original: prāha gambhīrayā vācā praṇamya vṛṣaketanam // KūrmP_1,29.12 //
analyzed: prāha gambhīrayā vācā praṇamya vṛṣaketanam

original: sādhu sādhu mahābhāga yatpṛṣṭaṃ bhavatā mune /
analyzed: sādhu sādhu mahābhāga yat pṛṣṭam bhavatā mune

original: vakṣye guhyatamād guhyaṃ śruṇvantvanye maharṣayaḥ // KūrmP_1,29.13 //
analyzed: vakṣye guhyatamāt guhyam śruṇvantu anye mahā ṛṣayaḥ
īśvareṇa purā proktam jñānam etat sanātanam
gūḍham aprājña vidviṣṭam sevitam sūkṣma darśibhiḥ
na aśraddadhāne dātavyam na abhakte parameṣṭhinaḥ

original: na vedavidviṣu śubhaṃ jñānanānāṃ jñānamuttamam // KūrmP_1,29.15 //
analyzed: na veda vidviṣu śubham jñāna nānām jñānam uttamam
meru śṛṅge purā devam īśānam tripura dviṣam
deva āsana gatā devī mahādevam apṛcchata
devī uvāca
devadeva mahādeva bhaktānām ārti nāśana

original: kathaṃ tvāṃ puruṣo devamacirādeva paśyati // KūrmP_1,29.17 //
analyzed: katham tvām puruṣaḥ devam acirāt eva paśyati
sāṃkhya yogaḥ tathā dhyānam karma yogaḥ vaidikaḥ

original: āyāsabahulā loke yāni cānyāni śaṅkara // KūrmP_1,29.18 //
analyzed: āyāsa bahulā loke yāni ca anyāni śaṅkara
yena vibrānta cittānām yoginām karmiṇām api

original: dṛśyo hi bhagavān sūkṣmaḥ sarveṣāmatha dehinām // KūrmP_1,29.19 //
analyzed: dṛśyaḥ hi bhagavān sūkṣmaḥ sarveṣām atha dehinām
etat guhyatamam jñānam gūḍham brahma ādi sevitama
hitāya sarva bhaktānām brūhi kāma aṅga nāśana
īśvaraḥ uvāca
avācyam etat vijñānam jñānam ajñaiḥ bahiṣkṛtam

original: vakṣye tava yathā tattvaṃ yaduktaṃ paramarṣibhiḥ // KūrmP_1,29.21 //
analyzed: vakṣye tava yathā tattvam yat uktam parama ṛṣibhiḥ

original: paraṃ guhyatamaṃ kṣetraṃ mama vārāṇasī purī /
analyzed: param guhyatamam kṣetram mama vārāṇasī purī
sarveṣām eva bhūtānām saṃsāra arṇava tāriṇī
tatra bhaktāḥ mahādevi madīyam vratam āsthitāḥ
nivasanti mahātmānaḥ param niyamam āsthitāḥ
uttamam sarva tīrthānām sthānānām uttamam ca tat
jñānānām uttamam jñānam avimuktam param mama
sthāna antaram pavitrāṇi tīrthāni āyatanāni ca
śmaśāna saṃsthitāni eva divya bhūmi gatāni ca
bhūrloke nā eva saṃlagnam antarikṣe mama ālayam

original: ayuktāstanna paśyanti yuktāḥ paśyanti cetasā // KūrmP_1,29.26 //
analyzed: ayuktāḥ tat na paśyanti yuktāḥ paśyanti cetasā
śmasānam etat vikhyātam avimuktam iti śrutam

original: kālo bhūtvā jagadidaṃ saṃharāmyatra sundari // KūrmP_1,29.27 //
analyzed: kālaḥ bhūtvā jagat idam saṃharāmi atra sundari
devi idam sarva guhyānām sthānam priyatamam mama

original: madbhaktāstatra gacchanti māmeva praviśanti te // KūrmP_1,29.28 //
analyzed: mad bhaktāḥ tatra gacchanti mām eva praviśanti te

original: dattaṃ japtaṃ hutaṃ ceṣṭaṃ tapastaptaṃ kṛtaṃ ca yat /
analyzed: dattam japtam hutam ca iṣṭam tapaḥ taptam kṛtam ca yat

original: dhyānamadhyayanaṃ jñānaṃ sarvaṃ tatrākṣayaṃ bhavet // KūrmP_1,29.29 //
analyzed: dhyānam adhyayanam jñānam sarvam tatra akṣayam bhavet
janma antara sahastreṣu yat pāpam pūrva saṃcitam

original: avimuktaṃ praviṣṭasya tatsarvaṃ vrajati kṣayam // KūrmP_1,29.30 //
analyzed: avimuktam praviṣṭasya tat sarvam vrajati kṣayam

original: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrā ye varṇasaṃkarāḥ /
analyzed: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyāḥ vaiśyāḥ śūdrāḥ ye varṇa saṃkarāḥ

original: striyo mlecchāśca ye cānye saṃkīrṇāḥ pāpayonayaḥ // KūrmP_1,29.31 //
analyzed: striyaḥ mlecchāḥ ca ye ca anye saṃkīrṇāḥ pāpa yonayaḥ
koṭāḥ pipīlikāḥ ca eva ye ca anye mṛga pakṣiṇaḥ

original: kālena nidhanaṃ prāptā avimukte varānane // KūrmP_1,29.32 //
analyzed: kālena nidhanam prāptāḥ avimukte varānane
candra ardha maulayaḥ tri akṣāḥ mahā vṛṣabha vāhanāḥ

original: śive mama pure devi jāyante tatra mānavāḥ // KūrmP_1,29.33 //
analyzed: śive mama pure devi jāyante tatra mānavāḥ
na avimukte mṛtaḥ kaścid narakam yāti kilbiṣī

original: īśvarānugṛhītā hi sarve yānti parāṃ gatim // KūrmP_1,29.34 //
analyzed: īśvara anugṛhītāḥ hi sarve yānti parām gatim

original: aśmanā caraṇau hatvā vārāṇasyāṃ vasennaraḥ // KūrmP_1,29.35 //
analyzed: aśmanā caraṇau hatvā vārāṇasyām vaset naraḥ
durlabhā tapasā ca api pūtasya parameśvari

original: yatra tatra vipannasya gatiḥ saṃsāramokṣaṇī // KūrmP_1,29.36 //
analyzed: yatra tatra vipannasya gatiḥ saṃsāra mokṣaṇī
prasādāt jāyate hi etat mama śailendranandini

original: aprabuddhā na paśyanti mama māyāvimohitāḥ // KūrmP_1,29.37 //
analyzed: aprabuddhāḥ na paśyanti mama māyā vimohitāḥ

original: avimuktaṃ na sevanti mūḍhā ye tamasāvṛtāḥ /
analyzed: avimuktam na sevanti mūḍhāḥ ye tamasā āvṛtāḥ

original: viṇmūtraretasāṃ madhye te vasanti punaḥ punaḥ // KūrmP_1,29.38 //
analyzed: viṣ mūtra retasām madhye te vasanti punar punar
hanyamānaḥ yaḥ vidvān vaset vighna śataiḥ api

original: sa yāti paramaṃ sthānaṃ yatra gatvā na śocati // KūrmP_1,29.39 //
analyzed: sa yāti paramam sthānam yatra gatvā na śocati
janma mṛtyu jarā muktam param yāti śiva ālayam
a punar maraṇānām hi sā gatiḥ mokṣa kāṅkṣiṇām

original: yāṃ prāpya kṛtakṛtyaḥ syāditi manyanti paṇḍatāḥ // KūrmP_1,29.40 //
analyzed: yām prāpya kṛtakṛtyaḥ syāt iti manyanti paṇḍatāḥ

original: na dānairna tapobhiśca na yajñairnāpi vidyayā /
analyzed: na dānaiḥ na tapobhiḥ ca na yajñaiḥ na api vidyayā

original: prāpyate gatirutkṛṣṭā yāvimukte tu labhyate // KūrmP_1,29.41 //
analyzed: prāpyate gatiḥ utkṛṣṭā yā avimukte tu labhyate
nānā varṇāḥ vivarṇāḥ ca caṇḍāla ādyāḥ jugupsitāḥ
